summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the east 40 feet of Lots 6, 7, 8 and 9, Block 2, Wallingford's Park Division of Green Lake Addition; and Lot 1, Block 17, Walker's Addition; with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-287.
